Interface ISessionsServiceAsync

public interface ISessionsServiceAsync

Asynchronous interface for Sessions service.

Author:

See Also:
ISessionsService}, {@link com.isotrol.impe3.pms.api.session.SessionsService SessionsService}

Checks whether a provided URI string would be accepted.

Parameters:
uri - URI to check.

changePassword

void changePassword(String currentPwd,
                    String newPwd,
                    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Changes the current user's password.

Parameters:
currentPwd - Current password.
newPwd - New password.
Throws:
AuthorizationException - if the provided current password is incorrect.
InvalidOperationException - if not allowed to change the password.
